verses.verse: And the chief <S%H7218><s%> fathers <S%H1><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Machir, <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> came <S%H7126><s%> near, <S%H5066><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> the princes, <S%H5387><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%> fathers <S%H1><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

And they said, <S%H559><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and my lord <S%H113><s%> was commanded <S%H6680><s%> by the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of Zelophehad <S%H6765><s%> our brother <S%H251><s%> to his daughters. <S%H1323><s%>

And if they be married <S%H802><s%> to any <S%H259><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the other <S%H259><s%> tribes <S%H7626><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> then shall their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> be taken <S%H1639><s%> from the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of our fathers, <S%H1><s%> and shall be put <S%H3254><s%> to the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> whereunto they are received: <S%H1961><s%> so shall it be taken <S%H1639><s%> from the lot <S%H1486><s%> of our inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

And when <S%H518><s%> the jubilee <S%H3104><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall be, then shall their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> be put <S%H3254><s%> to the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> whereunto <S%H834><s%> they are received: <S%H1961><s%> so shall their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> be taken <S%H1639><s%> away from the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of our fathers. <S%H1><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> according <S%H5921><s%> to the word <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> has said <S%H1696><s%> well. <S%H3651><s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> does command <S%H6680><s%> concerning the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zelophehad, <S%H6765><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Let them marry <S%H802><s%> to whom they think <S%H5869><s%> best; <S%H2896><s%> only <S%H389><s%> to the family <S%H4940><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of their father <S%H1><s%> shall they marry. <S%H802><s%>

So shall not the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> remove <S%H5437><s%> from tribe <S%H4294><s%> to tribe: <S%H4294><s%> for every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall keep <S%H1692><s%> himself to the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of his fathers. <S%H1><s%>

And every <S%H3605><s%> daughter, <S%H1323><s%> that possesses <S%H3423><s%> an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> in any tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> shall be wife <S%H802><s%> to one <S%H259><s%> of the family <S%H4940><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of her father, <S%H1><s%> that the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> may enjoy <S%H3423><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of his fathers. <S%H1><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> remove <S%H5437><s%> from one tribe <S%H4294><s%> to another <S%H312><s%> tribe; <S%H4294><s%> but every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall keep <S%H1692><s%> himself to his own inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>
Even as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zelophehad: <S%H6765><s%>

For Mahlah, <S%H4244><s%> Tirzah, <S%H8656><s%> and Hoglah, <S%H2295><s%> and Milcah, <S%H4435><s%> and Noah, <S%H5270><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zelophehad, <S%H6765><s%> were married <S%H802><s%> to their father's <S%H1730><s%> brothers' <S%H1730><s%> sons: <S%H1121><s%>

And they were married <S%H802><s%> into the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> remained <S%H1961><s%> in the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the family <S%H4940><s%> of their father. <S%H1><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the commandments <S%H4687><s%> and the judgments, <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> by Jordan <S%H3383><s%> near Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>
